Package com.tyndalehouse.step.core.service.jsword

Interface JSwordVersificationService

All Known Implementing Classes:
JSwordVersificationServiceImpl
public interface JSwordVersificationService
Some generally useful methods for dealing with versification.

  • Method Details

    • getVerseRange

      String getVerseRange(int startVerseId, int endVerseId, String version)
      Uses the version of the given book and calculates the verse range name
      Parameters:
      startVerseId - the starting verse ordinal
      endVerseId - the ending verse ordinal
      version - the initials of the book
      Returns:
      the reference in human readable form

    • getVerseRangeForSelectedVerses

      org.crosswire.jsword.passage.VerseRange getVerseRangeForSelectedVerses(String version, String numberedVersion, org.crosswire.jsword.versification.Versification versificationForNumberedVersion, org.crosswire.jsword.passage.Verse s, org.crosswire.jsword.passage.Verse e, org.crosswire.jsword.book.Book lookupVersion, Boolean roundReference, boolean ignoreVerse0)
      Obtains a verse range for the provided verses
      Parameters:
      version - the version to use for lookup purposes
      numberedVersion - the version of the Bible to use for the versification (i.e. verse ordinals)
      versificationForNumberedVersion - the actual versification object
      s - the start verse
      e - the end verse
      lookupVersion - the lookup version
      roundReference - whether to round up/down the reference
      ignoreVerse0 - whether to ignore verse 0 (i.e. the beginning of the chapter
      Returns:
      the verse range in question

    • getVersificationForVersion

      org.crosswire.jsword.versification.Versification getVersificationForVersion(org.crosswire.jsword.book.Book version)
      A helper method to get the versification from a book
      Parameters:
      version - the version we are interested in.
      Returns:
      the versification the versification of the book

    • getVersificationForVersion

      org.crosswire.jsword.versification.Versification getVersificationForVersion(String version)
      A helper method to get the versification from a book
      Parameters:
      version - the version we are interested in.
      Returns:
      the versification the versification of the book

    • getBookFromVersion

      org.crosswire.jsword.book.Book getBookFromVersion(String version)
      Gets a book from version initials, throws an exception if the book cannot be found
      Parameters:
      version - the version initials
      Returns:
      the JSword book

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the book returning null if not found
